ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_CustomStoneBlocksBase
ThingDef.description: Blocks of stone. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_DisabledStoneBlocksBase
ThingDef.description: Blocks of stone. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures.

ThingDef.label: tuff blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid tuff. It is relatively soft and easy to build with.

RecipeDef.label: make tuff blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts tuff chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedTuffBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed tuff
ThingDef.description: A soft rock formed by consolidation of volcanic ash. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_TuffBase
ThingDef.label: tuff
ThingDef.description: A soft rock formed by consolidation of volcanic ash.

RecipeDef.label: make tuff cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes tuff chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: tuff cobblestone
ThingDef.description: tuff smashed down to cobblestone. A soft rock formed by consolidation of volcanic ash.

ThingDef.label: desert glass blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid desert glass.

RecipeDef.label: make desert glass blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts desert glass chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedDesertGlassBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed desert glass
ThingDef.description: Solid desert glass formed by radiative melting of sandstone from large aerial bursts. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_DesertGlassBase
ThingDef.label: desert glass
ThingDef.description: Solid desert glass formed by radiative melting of sandstone from large aerial bursts.

RecipeDef.label: make desert glass cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes desert glass chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: desert glass cobblestone
ThingDef.description: desert glass smashed down to cobblestone. Solid desert glass formed by radiative melting of sandstone from large aerial bursts.

ThingDef.label: soapstone blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid soapstone. It is a very soft stone and easy to work with, but it isn't durable.

RecipeDef.label: make soapstone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts soapstone chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedSoapstoneBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed soapstone
ThingDef.description: A very soft rock converted from various minerals through a combination of heating, pressure and time. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SoapstoneBase
ThingDef.label: soapstone
ThingDef.description: A very soft rock converted from various minerals through a combination of heating, pressure and time.

RecipeDef.label: make soapstone cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes soapstone chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: soapstone cobblestone
ThingDef.description: soapstone smashed down to cobblestone. A very soft rock converted from various minerals through a combination of heating, pressure and time.

ThingDef.label: pumice blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid pumice. Pumice is a very light porous stone, and can even float on water because of pockets of gas in its pores.

RecipeDef.label: make pumice blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts pumice chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedPumiceBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed pumice
ThingDef.description: A very porous rock produced when lava with a very high content of water and gases is discharged from a volcano. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_PumiceBase
ThingDef.label: pumice
ThingDef.description: A very porous rock produced when lava with a very high content of water and gases is discharged from a volcano.

RecipeDef.label: make pumice cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes pumice chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: pumice cobblestone
ThingDef.description: pumice smashed down to cobblestone. A very porous rock produced when lava with a very high content of water and gases is discharged from a volcano.

ThingDef.label: phyllite blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid phyllite.

RecipeDef.label: make phyllite blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts phyllite chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedPhylliteBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed phyllite
ThingDef.description: A fine-grained metamorphic rock with a well-developed laminar structure. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_PhylliteBase
ThingDef.label: phyllite
ThingDef.description: A fine-grained metamorphic rock with a well-developed laminar structure.

RecipeDef.label: make phyllite cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes phyllite chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: phyllite cobblestone
ThingDef.description: phyllite smashed down to cobblestone. A fine-grained metamorphic rock with a well-developed laminar structure.

ThingDef.label: lunar stone blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid lunar rock.

RecipeDef.label: make lunar rock blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts lunar rock chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedLunarRockBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed lunar rock
ThingDef.description: A huge piece of moon rock fallen onto the planet after collisions with space debrees. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_LunarRockBase
ThingDef.label: lunar rock
ThingDef.description: A huge piece of moon rock fallen onto the planet after collisions with space debrees.

RecipeDef.label: make lunar rock cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes lunar rock chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: lunar rock cobblestone
ThingDef.description: lunar rock smashed down to cobblestone. An incredibly hard rock that originally formed a moon, but due to collisions with space debree huge pieces often hit the planet.

ThingDef.label: meteorite stone blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid meteorite stone.

RecipeDef.label: make meteorite rock blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts meteorite rock chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedMeteoriteRockBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed meteorite rock
ThingDef.description: Rocky remains of a meteorite. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_MeteoriteRockBase
ThingDef.label: meteorite rock
ThingDef.description: Rocky remains of a meteorite, very tough to dig through.

RecipeDef.label: make meteorite rock cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes meteorite rock chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: meteorite rock cobblestone
ThingDef.description: meteorite rock smashed down to cobblestone. An incredibly heavy and tough rock that originally formed a meteorite.

ThingDef.label: coquina blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of solid coquina.

RecipeDef.label: make coquina blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts coquina chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedCoquinaBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed coquina
ThingDef.description: A soft rock composed of broken shells. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_CoquinaBase
ThingDef.label: coquina
ThingDef.description: A soft rock composed of broken shells.

RecipeDef.label: make coquina cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes coquina chunks into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: coquina cobblestone
ThingDef.description: coquina smashed down to cobblestone. A soft rock composed of broken shells.

ThingDef.label: dirt blocks
ThingDef.description: A clump of mud and soil compacted into usable blocks. Can be used to build very weak and ugly walls.

RecipeDef.label: make dirt blocks
RecipeDef.description: Compacts dirt clumps into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedDirtBase
ThingDef.label: flattened dirt
ThingDef.description: A huge pile of compacted mud with soil. It was flattened to look slightly less ugly.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_DirtBase
ThingDef.label: dirt
ThingDef.description: A huge ugly pile of compacted mud with soil.

ThingDef.label: ancient fossil
ThingDef.description: blocks of ancient fossil reinforced by various accumulating minerals.

RecipeDef.label: make ancient fossil blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts ancient fossil pieces into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedAncientFossilBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed ancient fossil
ThingDef.description: Part of a giant skeleton. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface. Polishing reveals the inner structure of the bone, beautiful but highly flammable.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_AncientFossilBase
ThingDef.label: ancient fossil
ThingDef.description: Part of a giant skeleton, remains of an enormous ancient creature. It is covered in minerals, and inside lies a beautiful but flammable structure that can be revealed by polishing.

RecipeDef.label: make ancient fossil cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes ancient fossil pieces into cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: ancient fossil cobblestone
ThingDef.description: Ancient fossil smashed down to cobblestone.

ThingDef.label: ancient stone blocks
ThingDef.description: Blocks of ancient stone. It is filled with many ancient carvings.

RecipeDef.label: make ancient stone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts ancient stone chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_SmoothedAncientStoneBase
ThingDef.label: smoothed ancient stone
ThingDef.description: An extremely old rock that has seen many civilisations rise and fall. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface, revealing many ancient carvings.

ThingDef.Name: TMaterials_AncientStoneBase
ThingDef.label: ancient stone
ThingDef.description: An extremely old rock that has seen many civilisations rise and fall. It is filled with ancient art and carvings.

RecipeDef.label: make ancient cobblestone
RecipeDef.description: Smashes ancient stone chunks into cobblestone. This destroys all the ancient carvings.

ThingDef.label: ancient cobblestone
ThingDef.description: Ancient stone smashed down to generic cobblestone.
